title: The Harlequin Girl
description: Imagine looking so different, that no one ever sits next to you on a bus. That's life for 17-year-old Orla, with a large red birthmark disfiguring half her face. Then Orla meets Danny, an American boy who doesn't care about looks. But with a shocking past, Danny has scars of his own, only on the inside. Can these two friends help each other in a world which truly shows an ugly face?
author: Laurinda Luffman
